definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

da4 liang4 sha1 shang1 wu3 qi4

sentences.english: Some 44 million antipersonnel mines have been destroyed from stockpiles.
sentences.chinese: 库存的杀伤人员地雷已有4400万个被销毁了。

sentences.english: Determining the antipersonnel force of arms is one of the main tasks in detecting arms.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定枪械杀伤能力是检测枪械的重要项目之一。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of injurious effect of alternating impulse magnetic field on tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨交变脉冲强磁场对肿瘤组织杀伤作用的机理。

sentences.english: The lethality of venom depends on a combination of its potency, the volume delivered and the size of the victim.
sentences.chinese: 毒液的杀伤性取决于毒液量和受害者的体型。

sentences.english: Objective To study the killing effect of Zijin powder extract on human osteosarcoma cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨中药紫金散对人骨肉瘤细胞的杀伤作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion The CMM has marked damaging effect to Cysticercus cellulosae.
sentences.chinese: 结论中药灭囊灵对猪囊尾蚴具有明显的杀伤作用。

sentences.english: Lipoprotein with higher titer of SCSP showed higher killing ability on cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: SCSP的含量高，则对癌细胞的杀伤作用强。

sentences.english: Has manifested the very strong lethality.
Rocket Launcher capable of delivering a great, if inaccurate salvo, over a large area.
sentences.chinese: 火箭炮车虽然精度欠缺，但可以进行大范围杀伤。

sentences.english: Psychological stress was also linked to weaker bacteria-fighting ability in the skin of the mice.
sentences.chinese: 而且，心理压力也会减弱小鼠皮肤杀伤细菌的能力。

sentences.english: You beat word too injuriously, again to break my heart.
sentences.chinese: 你敲打的文字太有杀伤力了，又一次地把我的心敲碎。

sentences.english: She is long-range lethality highest warriors, have penetrate enemy stunts.
sentences.chinese: 她是远程杀伤里最高的兵种，拥有穿透敌人的特技。

sentences.english: Libyan leader Moammar Khadafi announced earlier this month he's abandoning the pursuit of weapons of mass destruction .
sentences.chinese: 本月早些时候曾宣布要放弃发展大规模杀伤性武器。

sentences.english: The main duty of their destruction should be by resisting arrest arising from the conduct of staff.
sentences.chinese: 其相关责任主要是由拒捕杀伤应捕人员的行为引起的。

sentences.english: Its infectious, the dissemination way are many, kills Fan in a big way II.
sentences.chinese: 它传染性强，传播途径多，杀伤范II大。

sentences.english: The next day I called for a global ban on anti-personnel land mines.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，我呼吁在全球禁止杀伤性的地雷。

definition: dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to throw sth a long distance/to hurl/to throw at/to throw (dice etc)/to flip (a coin)
